label: OUR WORK & CULTURE
title: Come and join a team of highly skilled professionals.
text: Our company culture is something we feel is at the core of creating a great business for all stakeholders involved. If we create a place where we love to work, then we can all settle in and revel in being great at what we do.

listItems.title: Covid-19 insurance
listItems.text: Insurance for foreigners helps to cover cost of treatment if you were diagnosed with Covid-19

listItems.title: Flexible working time
listItems.text: Flexible working including part time working options

listItems.title: Work from home
listItems.text: Fully hybrid work model meaning you choose where you work and which days

listItems.title: Annual retreats
listItems.text: An annual planning retreat is a crucial opportunity for business leaders to step away from the day-to-day grind

listItems.title: Learning stipend
listItems.text: Continuous learning and training options including LinkedIn Learning and Master Class
